comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for the information about Francis Scott Key. This image shows a monument to him located in Baltimore, Maryland. This article about its restoration and rededication in 1999 shows the same rowhouses in the background: www.heritagepreservation.org/NEWS/Key.htm
